BÁNH MÌ

Vietnamese bánh mì is a type of sandwich that is typically made with either a pork or chicken patty, pickled vegetables, and cilantro on a French baguette.

1 servings 15-20 minutes
THIS IS AN ADVERT

Equipment

  • Oven
  • Baking sheet
  • Knife
  • Cutting board

Ingredients

  • Pork or chicken patty
  • Pickled vegetables
  • Cilantro
  • French baguette

Directions

  1. Preheat oven to 375 degrees F.
  2. Place chicken or pork patty on a baking sheet.
  3. Top with pickled vegetables and cilantro.
  4. Bake in preheated oven for 15-20 minutes.
  5. Serve on a French baguette.
